com.sri.ai.expresso.api

Interface Tuple

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>, Expression, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTuple

    @Beta
public interface Tuple
extends Expression
    An Expression that represents a tuple of sub-expressions. Like a FunctionApplication, a tuple has a number of arguments; but unlike function applications, it does not have a functor.

    Author:
    braz
